name: Zoho Sprints
description: Agile project management tool for Scrum teams with sprint planning, backlog management, burndown charts, daily standups, and team collaboration features for software development

opengraph.title: Online agile project management software | Zoho Sprints
opengraph.description: Zoho Sprints is an Agile project management software that helps dynamic teams plan, track, iterate, and deliver their fast-paced projects with ease. Explore Zoho Sprints for free today.
